snippet.title: Heroic - Magic Duel: The Battle Is On Worldwide!
snippet.description:
DOWNLOAD NOW!
Android: https://norde.us/heroiconandroid
iOS: https://norde.us/heroiconios

An intense strategy-driven PvP battle game for thrill-seekers and competitive types—the kind of people who roar “Bring it on!” in the face of a serious challenge.

Battle your way through Heroic Arenas. Master a variety of Heroes, each with their own unique skills and traits. Collect, upgrade and evolve powerful Spells and Minions, build a Deck to match your playstyle and climb your way up the Leaderboards as you crush one enemy Portal after another…. all the way to the Legendary Arena! 

But don’t forget to Guild up. Cause even the biggest Heroes can’t raid the foul bosses on their own. Reap the rewards from PvE events to buff your Hero and bring destruction back to PvP. They won’t know what hit ‘em! 

One last thing. Don’t ever let the beautiful, fantasy graphics fool you. This isn’t art. It’s absolute mayhem. And what do we say to mayhem? You got it, BRING. IT. ON!

Music by Quasarborn: https://www.facebook.com/quasarborn101/
Check out their latest video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0tIBhBzVUL4

______________________________________

Join Heroes around the world on Heroic's community channels:

Official Forum: https://community.heroicgame.com/
Discord: https://invite.gg/playheroic 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/playheroic/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/playheroic/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/playheroic
